name: Api\Objects\CreateArticleMetadataFields
description: See the optional metadata fields for the create article request.

properties.name: accessoryText
properties.description: Text to include below the article excerpt in the channel view, such as a byline or category label.

properties.name: isCandidateToBeFeatured
properties.description: Indicates whether or not this article should be considered for featuring in News. See Creating Articles for Featured Stories.

properties.name: isHidden
properties.description: Indicates whether or not the article should be temporarily hidden from display in the News feed.

properties.name: isPreview
properties.description:
Indicates whether this article should be public (live) or should be a preview that is only visible to members of your channel. Set isPreview to false to publish the article right away and make it visible to all News users. 
If your channel has not yet been approved to publish articles in Apple News Format, setting isPreview to false will result in an ONLY_PREVIEW_ALLOWED error.

properties.name: isSponsored
properties.description: Indicates whether this article consists of sponsored content for promotional purposes. Sponsored content must be marked as such; channels that do not follow this policy may be suspended.

properties.name: maturityRating
properties.description: Indicates the viewing audience for the content. Note that a MATURE rating indicates explicit content that is only appropriate for a specific audience.
